name: Foundation
overview: Follow a band of exiles on their monumental journey to save humanity and rebuild civilization amid the fall of the Galactic Empire.

episodes.name: The Emperor’s Peace
episodes.overview: Gaal Dornick leaves her life in Synnax behind when the galaxy’s greatest mathematician, Hari Seldon, invites her to Trantor.

episodes.name: Preparing to Live
episodes.overview: The Foundation makes the long journey to Terminus as Gaal and Raych grow closer. The Empire faces a difficult decision.

episodes.name: The Mathematician’s Ghost
episodes.overview: Brother Dusk reflects on his legacy as he prepares for ascension. The Foundation arrives on Terminus and finds a mysterious object.

episodes.name: Barbarians at the Gate
episodes.overview: Salvor faces off with an enemy of the Empire. Brothers Day and Dusk are at odds, while Brother Dawn wrestles with his truth.

episodes.name: Upon Awakening
episodes.overview: A flashback reveals the origin of Gaal’s conflict between faith and science. The standoff on Terminus takes an unfortunate turn.

episodes.name: Death and the Maiden
episodes.overview: Brother Day meets Zephyr Halima—a would-be leader who opposes the Empire. Brother Dusk grows suspicious of Brother Dawn.

episodes.name: Mysteries and Martyrs
episodes.overview: The Anacreons and their hostages board the fabled Invictus warship. The bond between Brother Dawn and Azura intesifies.

episodes.name: The Missing Piece
episodes.overview: Brother Day embarks on a journey that no other Cleon has ever attempted. Salvor prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice to return home.

episodes.name: The First Crisis
episodes.overview: On Terminus, Salvor witnesses how powerful the null field has become. Brother Dawn makes a daring choice.

episodes.name: The Leap
episodes.overview: An unexpected ally helps Salvor broker an alliance. A confrontation between the Brothers leads to unthinkable consequences. Season finale.

name: The Wheel of Time
overview: Follow Moiraine, a member of the shadowy and influential all-female organization called the “Aes Sedai” as she embarks on a dangerous, world-spanning journey with five young men and women. Moiraine believes one of them might be the reincarnation of an incredibly powerful individual, whom prophecies say will either save humanity or destroy it.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: The Wheel of Time: Origins, a series of animated short films that tell several stories set during the years and centuries before the events of the TV series.

episodes.name: The Breaking of the World
episodes.overview: Detailing the Breaking of the World, the cataclysmic event caused when all male channelers went mad as a result of the source of their magic being corrupted by The Dark One.

episodes.name: The Fall of Menetheren
episodes.overview: Explains the Fall of Manetheren, a city-state that once stood in the Two Rivers region.

episodes.name: Leavetaking
episodes.overview: A strange noblewoman arrives in a remote mountain village, claiming one of five youths is the reincarnation of an ancient power who once destroyed the world – and will do so again, if she’s not able to discover which of them it is. But they all have less time than they think.

episodes.name: Shadow's Waiting
episodes.overview: Moiraine and Lan lead the four villagers to safety, unsure which is the one from the prophecy. But the friends are equally unsure about their rescuers, especially once they see how far Moiraine is willing to go for her mission – and how far astray Lan is willing to lead them.

episodes.name: A Place of Safety
episodes.overview: Moiraine and Lan find help in an unexpected – and unwanted – quarter, as the separated villagers try to find their way back to each other, or at least to refuge. But they all soon learn how far the Dark One’s reach extends, and how few they can trust on the road.

episodes.name: The Dragon Reborn
episodes.overview: Moiraine struggles with uncertainty while Lan struggles with their new companion. Rand wonders about Mat and Mat starts to wonder at himself. Egwene and Perrin take their first steps down a different path. An incredible new power is unleashed on the world.

episodes.name: Blood Calls Blood
episodes.overview: Perrin and Egwene run into a familiar face. Mat and Rand see strange ones. Moiraine and Lan mourn their loss.

episodes.name: The Flame of Tar Valon
episodes.overview: Moiraine faces the consequences of her actions. Mat faces the darkness in himself. Egwene faces the most powerful woman in the world.

episodes.name: The Dark Along the Ways
episodes.overview: Moiraine and her charges are diverted from their path by an unexpected encounter. This diversion, though, reveals many things — Moiraine’s true goal, Lan’s past, the fractures that have grown in the group, and the identity of the Dragon Reborn.

episodes.name: The Eye of the World
episodes.overview: Season finale. For twenty years, Moiraine has dreamed and worked towards this moment. But she can't stop the Dragon Reborn from seeing the appeal of the Dark.

name: Squid Game
overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games—with high stakes. But, a tempting prize awaits the victor.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

episodes.name: Red Light, Green Light
episodes.overview: Hoping to win easy money, a broke and desperate Gi-hun agrees to take part in an enigmatic game. Not long into the first round, unforeseen horrors unfold.

episodes.name: Hell
episodes.overview: Split on whether to continue or quit, the group holds a vote. But their realities in the outside world may prove to be just as unforgiving as the game.

episodes.name: The Man with the Umbrella
episodes.overview: A few players enter the next round — which promises equal doses of sweet and deadly — with hidden advantages. Meanwhile, Jun-ho sneaks his way inside.

episodes.name: Stick to the Team
episodes.overview: As alliances form among the players, no one is safe in the dorm after lights-out. The third game challenges Gi-hun's team to think strategically.

episodes.name: A Fair World
episodes.overview: Gi-hun and his team take turns keeping guard through the night. The masked men encounter trouble with their co-conspirators.

episodes.name: Gganbu
episodes.overview: Players pair off for the fourth game. Gi-hun grapples with a moral dilemma, Sang-woo chooses self-preservation and Sae-byeok shares her untold story.

episodes.name: VIPS
episodes.overview: The Masked Leader welcomes VIP guests to the facility for a front-row viewing of the show. In the fifth game, some players crack under pressure.

episodes.name: Front Man
episodes.overview: Ahead of the last round, distrust and disgust run deep among the finalists. Jun-ho makes a getaway, determined to expose the game's dirty secrets.

episodes.name: One Lucky Day
episodes.overview: The final round presents another cruel test — but this time, how it ends depends on just one player. The game's creator steps out of the shadows.
